snippet: The state Supreme Court indefinitely suspended the law license of former Attorney General Phill Kline on Friday after allegations of ethical misconduct during his investigation of abortion providers.
abstract: Kansas State Supreme Court indefinitely suspends law license of former Atty Gen Phill Kline after allegations of ethical misconduct during his investigation of abortion providers; court unanimously agrees with a state disciplinary panel that Kline, a Republican, repeatedly misled or allowed subordinates to mislead others, including a Kansas City-area grand jury, to further his investigations.
lead_paragraph: The state Supreme Court indefinitely suspended the law license of former Attorney General Phill Kline on Friday after allegations of ethical misconduct during his investigation of abortion providers.

headline.main: Kansas: Former Attorney General Loses Law License for Anti-Abortion Actions
headline.print_headline:
Kansas: Former Attorney General Loses
Law License for Anti-Abortion Actions
